programme.title: Hurricane Elena, 1985
programme.short_synopsis: An increase in the legal drinking age to 21, and the path of Hurricane Elena.
programme.medium_synopsis: Hurricane Elena's path of destruction along the Florida coast, and the proposed raise in the legal drinking age from 18 or 19 to 21 in all but fifteen states.
programme.long_synopsis: Hurricane Elena's path of destruction along the Florida coast, and the proposed raise in the legal drinking age from 18 or 19 to 21 in all but fifteen states.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
